name: VirusExterminator
description:
:

🔷The player enters a world made by an AI, but the world has been infected. So you help to kill the virus

⚪Controls: 🎮

🔷A/S/D/W -> Move

🔷Space -> Jump

🔷LM (Left Mouse ) -> Attack

🔷Shift / F -> Dash

🔷ESC / P -> Pause

⚪Credits:

Most Art - > https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/asset-fttgr-free-pixel-art...

Everything else by me (except music)
